Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Darrell Yates Rist, Joyce Hunter, and Jim Levin, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2. Short news stories3. Discussion of Catholic Archdiocese's banning of Catholic gay rights groups from churchesCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine4. One year anniversary of the passing of New York City's gay right bill, with clips from GCN's coverage of the event, and discussion of the progress of gay rights since the billCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation5. Andy Humm on the growing participation of the gay community in activism6. News Watch, Vatican newspaper criticizes condom use as a method of stopping spread of AIDS, advocating the stopping of gay sex7. Seattle Times rejects an ad from Parents and Friends of Lesbians and Gays, due to the use of the word "gay"8. Vermont, gay rights bill introduced in state legislature9. Delta Airlines avoids national gay boycott after Delta agrees to meet demands of gay group, including non-discrimination of passengers with AIDS10. Sports Report, with clips from the Dr. Ruth show11. Lavender Health, interview with Felicia Schady, public health educator with the Hepatitis B Prevention Unit at the NYC Health Department12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History, with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: Night of a Thousand Gowns charity drag balls2. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, interview with Helen [Schumaker], actress in the one-woman show, "Mona Rogers in Person," with clipsCOMMERCIAL: Zamir Furs3. Show Bits with George Trahanis, review of Barbara Gelb's two-act, one-character play "My Gene"COMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine4. Second part of the interview series on the operating methods of GMHC, with playwright Larry Kramer, and a response by the executive director of GMHC, Richard Dunne, tape cuts off
